moves.1. d4: I was black in this game..
moves.6. dxe5 Nxe5 7. Nge2 Bd6 8. O-O Nxd3: Like to exchange the piece now..
moves.9. cxd3 Be6 10. a3 Ng4: Giving a way for my Queen.
moves.12. Kg2 c5 13. Nf4: I do not like my opponent to enter my premises. Hence, ...
moves.15. Qf3: Come on Queen. I'm waiting for you..
moves.16... f5: f5 is a must as f5 by my opponent will collapse all my plans...
moves.17. Rae1 Bf7: one move is remaining for my Bishop to be placed on a right place.
moves.18. Re2 Bh5: Here comes my Bishop on a right spot.
moves.19. Rfe1: Lining up the battery to enter my premises. I didn't bother. Still stick with my plan.
moves.19... d4: Blocking all the way of whites Queen sitting on f3 long time.
moves.20. Re2e6: Ouch! Threatening to gain my Queen. But its too late.
moves.20... Ne3+: Black resigns here, as any move further will give the loss of more materials to black. Just try to analyze!
